channel.title: Using libevl on Xenomai 4
channel.description: Recent content in Using libevl on Xenomai 4

item.title: API revisions
item.description: You can obtain the current API revision of libevl either at compilation time using the value of the __EVL__ macro defined in the <evl/evl.h> main header file, or dynamically by calling evl_get_version(). rev. 18 (libevl r26) Introduces the socket interface: oob_recvmsg() to receive a message in out-of-band mode. oob_sendmsg() to send a message in out-of-band mode. The regular socket(2) call as extended by ABI 26 is capable of creating oob-capable sockets when receiving the SOCK_OOB type flag, so there is no EVL-specific call for this operation.
